## Means and variance 
Means and variances of the distributions introduced so far: 

Distribution | Mean | Variance
----------|--------|---------
Bernoulli | $\pi$ | $\pi(1-\pi)$
Binomial | $\pi$ | $n\pi(1-\pi)$
Normal | $\mu$ | $\sigma^2$
